# axm_device_management_service (List Resource)

Searches for Apple Business Manager device management services.

## Example Usage

```terraform
list "axm_device_management_service" "london_mdm_servers" {
    provider = axm

    config {
        # Only return device management services whose name includes "London"
        name_contains = "London"

        # Limit the search to Apple Business Manager MDM server records
        server_type = "MDM"
    }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `name` (String) Filters results by a case-insensitive exact server name.
- `name_contains` (String) Filters results by a case-insensitive substring match on the server name.
- `server_type` (String) Filters results by the Apple Business Manager server type (MDM, APPLE_CONFIGURATOR, APPLE_MDM).
